mapper.select: select distinct t.id id, t.quality_checking_id qualityCheckingId, t.batch_number batchNumber, t.date_of_manufacture dateOfManufacture, t.date_of_manufacture1 dateOfManufacture1, t.production_time_start productionTimeStart, t.production_time_end productionTimeEnd, t.materiel_id materielId, t.quality_checking qualityChecking, m.maktx materielName from crm.crm_tb_quality_checking t left join office.office_tb_materiel m on t.materiel_id = m.matnr where 1 = 1 and t.batch_number = #{batchNumber}
